title: FUBAR Emergency Destroyer 2014
description:
FUBAR Emergency Destroyer 2014
------------------------------

This is a slightly modified version of the normal FUBAR Destroyer.


As the name suggests, this application will WIPE & DESTROY all files on all harddisks and removable drives on your computer!

Recovery is not possible.
Your data will not be forever lost and unrecoverable - but it will be extremely hard, and for experts only, to get the data back.

In other words: Unless "they" know what they are looking for, they will not spend the resources needed to find it.


When you run this application, you will get a simple message, with "OK" and "Cancel", telling that it is ready to destroy.
Click on OK, and - well, you know the rest :)


There is only 1 warning with this version! And it does not appear to be a warning.
So please be careful, and enjoy.


/Ubehage
